Class ingen.html.HtmlTag 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ingen.html.HtmlTag
public class HtmlTag
extends Object
Base Class HtmlTag :   which implements basic functionality of any HTML tag. All of the classes provided in this packages are extended from this base class. Developer can derive his own class from this base class to add new html tags.

attribute
attribute default value is empty string.
content
content Maintains a list of content objects.

delimitor
delimitor default value is '>'.
endTag
endTag default value is empty string.
prefix
prefix Maintains a list of starttags, which specifies extra formating information about this tag.

starter
starter default value is '<'.
startTag
startTag default value is empty string.
suffix
suffix Maintains a list of endtags corresponding to formating tags added in prfix list.

HtmlTag()

add(Object)
SUMMARY:
Developer can create Object of any class dervied from HtmlTag class or simple String and add it to any other object of class derived from HtmlTag component class using this method.
getAttribute()
SUMMARY:
Return attribute Object assosiated with start tag.

getAttributeData()
SUMMARY:
Return String representation of attribute assosiated with start tag.

getContentData()
SUMMARY:
Return String representation of contents added in this htmltag.

getEndTag()
SUMMARY:
Return String representation of end tag
i.e return value = starter + endTag + delimitor;

getPrefix()
SUMMARY:
Return String representation of prefix tag.

getStartTag()
SUMMARY:
Return String representation of start tag
i.e return value = starter + starttag + attributes + delimitor;

getSuffix()
SUMMARY:
Return String representation of suffix tag.

setAttribute(Object)
SUMMARY:
Set attribute assosiated with start tag.

setFormat(Object)
SUMMARY:
set extra formating tag for this tag.

toString()
SUMMARY:
Specifies how this object is represented in string format.
i.e return value = startTag + prefix\s + content + suffix\s + endtag;

startTag 
 protected String startTag
startTag default value is empty string. Developer can assign a value to this varibale in dervied class. This value is used as start tag in representation of this object.

endTag 
 protected String endTag
endTag default value is empty string. Developer can assign a value to this varibale in dervied class. This value is used as end tag in representation of this object.

starter 
 protected String starter
starter default value is '<'. Developer can assign a value to this varibale in dervied class. This value is used as starter in representation of this object.

delimitor 
 protected String delimitor
delimitor default value is '>'. Developer can assign a value to this varibale in dervied class. This value is used as delimitor in representation of this object.

attribute 
 protected Object attribute
attribute default value is empty string. Developer can assign a value to this varibale in dervied class. This value is used as extra attributes in start tag.

content 
 protected Vector content
content Maintains a list of content objects.

prefix 
 protected Vector prefix
prefix Maintains a list of starttags, which specifies extra formating information about this tag.

suffix 
 protected Vector suffix
suffix Maintains a list of endtags corresponding to formating tags added in prfix list.

HtmlTag 
 public HtmlTag()

getStartTag 
 protected String getStartTag()
SUMMARY:
Return String representation of start tag
i.e return value = starter + starttag + attributes + delimitor;

getEndTag 
 protected String getEndTag()
SUMMARY:
Return String representation of end tag
i.e return value = starter + endTag + delimitor;

 protected Object getAttribute()
SUMMARY:
Return attribute Object assosiated with start tag.

 protected void setAttribute(Object attribute)
SUMMARY:
Set attribute assosiated with start tag.

getAttributeData 
 protected String getAttributeData()
SUMMARY:
Return String representation of attribute assosiated with start tag.

getContentData 
 protected String getContentData()
SUMMARY:
Return String representation of contents added in this htmltag.

add 
 public void add(Object content)
SUMMARY:
Developer can create Object of any class dervied from HtmlTag class or simple String and add it to any other object of class derived from HtmlTag component class using this method. Each HtmlTag object maintains a list of objects added in it.

PARAMETERS
  Name               content
  Type               Object
  Desc               Add html component in this component.

SUMMARY:
Return String representation of prefix tag.

SUMMARY:
Return String representation of suffix tag.

 public void setFormat(Object Obj)
SUMMARY:
set extra formating tag for this tag.

toString 
 public String toString()
SUMMARY:
Specifies how this object is represented in string format.
i.e return value = startTag + prefix\s + content + suffix\s + endtag;
